import React, { Component } from "react"; import Footer from './Footer' import './css/style.css' import 'react-modal-video/scss/modal-video.scss' import ModalVideo from 'react-modal-video' import $ from "jquery"; import axios from 'axios' import ReactHtmlParser, { processNodes, convertNodeToElement, htmlparser2 } from 'react-html-parser'; class Features extends Component { constructor() { super() this.state = { isOpen: false, feature: "" } this.openModal = this.openModal.bind(this) } openModal() { this.setState({ isOpen: true }) } componentDidMount() { const home = axios.create({ baseURL: "https://stag-new-api.contentstack.io/v3/content_types/feature_page/entries/blt6e57111ed8518c7a", // timeout: 1000, headers: { api_key: "blt74a459c57a383bbf", authtoken: "bltac1fe73d78f7ddab" } }); home.get() .then((data) => { console.log(data); this.setState({ feature: data }, () => { console.log(this.state.feature) }) }).catch((err) => { console.log(err); }) } render() { if (this.state.feature !== "") { const headingAdvantage = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.content const descriptionOne = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[0].description const descriptionTwo = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[1].description const descriptionThree = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[2].description const descriptionFour = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[3].description const tabOne = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[0].description const tabTwo = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[1].description const tabThree = this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[2].description return ( <>
{ReactHtmlParser(headingAdvantage)}

{this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[0].title}

{ReactHtmlParser(descriptionOne)}

{this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[1].title}

{ReactHtmlParser(descriptionTwo)}

{this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[2].title}

{ReactHtmlParser(descriptionThree)}

{this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.advantages[3].title}

{ReactHtmlParser(descriptionFour)}

  • {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[0].title}
  • {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[1].title}
  • {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[2].title}
{/* */}
{ReactHtmlParser(tabOne)} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[0].cta[0].title} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[1].cta[1].title}
{ReactHtmlParser(tabTwo)} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[0].cta[0].title} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[1].cta[1].title}
{ReactHtmlParser(tabThree)} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[0].cta[0].title} {this.state.feature.data.entry.advantages.tab_section[1].cta[1].title}
this.setState({ isOpen: false })} /> ) } else { return null }; } } export default Features;
